original_text: And they had a king over them, which is the angel of the bottomless pit, whose name in the Hebrew tongue is Abaddon, but in the Greek tongue hath his name Apollyon.
korean_text: 그들에게 왕이 있으니 무저갱의 사자라 히브리어로는 그 이름이 아바돈이요 헬라어로는 그 이름이 아볼루온이더라

sentences.original_text: And they had a king over them
which is the angel of the bottomless pit
whose name in the Hebrew tongue is Abaddon
but in the Greek tongue hath his name Apollyon
